titleStmt.title: The triumph of beautie· As it was personated by some young gentlemen, for whom it was intended, at a private recreation. / By James Shirley.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Princes Armes in St Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part of his: Poems, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Princes Armes in St Pauls Churchyard
